page.title: 04GOLF COURSE BRYNFORD
page.content:
There is a golf course near the village which is called Holywell Golf club. It is a nine hole golf course.There are flags in the greens to show where the holes are.There are lots of hills by the golf course also gorse bushes and ferns where lots of people loose their golf balls. After they have played golf they go to the golf house for some drinks and a meal.Over the meal they talk about the game. In the club house they also play games like snooker and darts. There is a road going between the golf course and club house. Passing cars have to be careful so the golf balls dont hit the windows of the car. The golfers sometimes have trouble with the sheep running up and down the golf course.
.
